      • createContext

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Object> createContext(Attributed algorithm,
                                             TTDataSet dataSet,
                                             Recommender recommender)
        Description copied from interface: Metric

        Create the context for an experimental condition (algorithm/data set pair).

        Specified by:
        createContext in interface Metric<java.util.List<java.lang.Object>>
        Parameters:
        algorithm - The algorithm.
        dataSet - The data set.
        recommender - The LensKit recommender, if applicable. This can be null for an external algorithm that does not provide a LensKit recommender.
        Returns:
        The accumulator. This will be passed to Metric.measureUser(TestUser, Object). If the metric does not accumulate any results, this method can return null.
